mapper.select: SELECT sum(om.price-os.stock_price) sum_money, us.id user_id, us.mobile user_mobile, ca.name name, ca.id_card card, ca.create_time create_time FROM `order` o INNER JOIN merchant m ON o.merchant_id=m.id JOIN user us ON us.id=m.user_id JOIN `0085_cashier` ca on ca.merchant_id=m.id INNER JOIN order_menu om on om.order_id =o.id INNER JOIN menu me on me.id=om.menu_id INNER JOIN `0085_stock` AS os ON os.menu_id=me.id WHERE m.id=#{id} AND ca.create_time BETWEEN #{create_time} AND #{now_time}
SELECT cas.create_time FROM 0085_cashier cas JOIN merchant me on cas.merchant_id=me.id WHERE me.id=#{id}
